email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 50,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The initial freight quote is USD 25 per metric ton. The laycan is set for October 10 to October 15.

Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 23 per metric ton?

Also, could you provide details on the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, we can offer a revised freight rate of USD 24 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day.

The loading window is 48 hours, starting from the laycan period of October 10 to October 15.

Please let us know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 24 per metric ton, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Newcastle on October 10, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Thanks,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
